resources.string: Braille is a system of raised dots used for reading and writing by visually impaired people. Here, you will learn letters, numbers, and how to type Braille easily.
Note: Numbers 0 - 9 are written the same way as letters a to j
Lets practice typing Braille letters with a fun quiz game! Swipe up to start the quiz, or swipe down for free Braille typing simulation.
